titleStmt.title: A delicate diet, for daintiemouthde droonkardes Wherein the fowle abuse of common carowsing, and quaffing with hartie draughtes, is honestlie admonished. By George Gascoyne Esquier.
titleStmt.author: Gascoigne, George, 1542?-1577.
Augustine, Saint, Bishop of Hippo.

notesStmt.note: A6v-B4v have an excerpt from St. Augustine.
Running title reads: A delicate dyet for droonkards.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
